name: Cain - Daytona - 654T
additionalNotes: Cain Daytona is a more refined version of its Ligero-laced brethren, Cain. This medium-bodied version is accomplished with the utilization of an all-Jalapa filler blend delivering a balanced level of smoothness and flavor without the intense body and strength of the regular Cain. Construction is spot-on and is headlined by an oily Nicaraguan wrapper that is not only visually appealing, but also highly complex with notes ranging from green pepper to a creamy, honey-like sweetness.Â
